About Heaton Moor Golf Club

Over 130 years of golfing tradition, championship golf, and member-owned excellence in the heart of Greater Manchester.

Our Heritage

Founded in 1892, Heaton Moor Golf Club stands as one of Greater Manchester's most prestigious and historic golf clubs. For over 130 years, we have been providing exceptional golf and hospitality to members and visitors alike.

As a member-owned club, we are committed to maintaining the highest standards of course condition, facilities, and service. Our independence allows us to focus solely on what matters most: providing an outstanding golf experience.

Located in a beautiful conservation area in Heaton Mersey, Stockport, our parkland course offers a perfect blend of challenge and beauty, making every round a memorable experience.

Course Features

Design & Layout

  • 🌳 Tree-lined fairways requiring accuracy
  • 🔄 Two 9-hole loops from clubhouse
  • 🎯 Strategic bunkering and hazards

Setting & Environment

  • 🏞️ Beautiful parkland setting
  • 🌿 Protected conservation area
  • 🦋 Rich wildlife and natural habitat
